mapper.select: select r.reservation_date, d.doctor_name as doctorName, p.name, p.email from reservation r join doctor d using(doctor_id) join patient p using(patient_id) where r.reservation_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET status = CASE WHEN status = 'WAIT' THEN 'CONSULT' WHEN status = 'CONSULT' THEN 'DONE' ELSE status END, updated_at = NOW() WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} AND status IN ('WAIT', 'CONSULT')
